name: Revenue Report
query:
SELECT
    m.gym_member_name AS "Gym Member::200",
    m.membership_plan_name AS "Membership Plan::200",
    m.start_date AS "Start Date:Date:120",
    m.end_date AS "End Date:Date:120",
    m.status AS "Membership Status::120",
    si.name AS "Sales Invoice:Link/Sales Invoice:200",
    si.status AS "Status::120",
    si.grand_total AS "Invoice Amount:Currency:150"

FROM
    `tabMembership` m
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Invoice` si ON si.name = m.invoice
WHERE
    si.docstatus = 1
ORDER BY
    si.posting_date DESC;
